00050 function cwc_syslog($prio, $file, $func, $line, $msg)
00051 {
00052     global $LOG_LEVEL, $LOG_PRIOS;
00053 
00054     try {
00055         openlog("cwc", LOG_PID, LOG_LOCAL0);
00056         
00057         if ($prio <= $LOG_LEVEL) {
00058             $func= $func == '' ? 'NA' : $func;
00059             $log= "$LOG_PRIOS[$prio] $file: $func ($line): $msg\n";
00060             if (!syslog($prio, $log)) {
00061                 if (!fwrite(STDERR, $log)) {
00062                     echo $log;
00063                 }
00064             }
00065         }
00066         closelog();
00067     }
00068     catch (Exception $e) {
00069         echo 'Caught exception: ',  $e->getMessage(), "\n";
00070         echo "cwc_syslog() failed: $prio, $file, $func, $line, $msg\n";
00071         // No need to closelog(), it is optional
00072     }
00073 }

00279 $MonthDays= array(
00280     1   => 31,
00281     2   => 29, 
00282     3   => 31,
00283     4   => 30,

00294 function IsFilePath($filepath)
00295 {
00296     return preg_match('|^/var/log/\w[\w./-]*$|', $filepath)
00297         // For CVS Tag displayed in the footer
00298         || preg_match('|^/var/www/htdocs/comixwall/View/\w[\w./-]*$|', $filepath)
00299         // Messaging logs
00300         || preg_match('|^/var/log/imspector/\w[^$`]*$|', $filepath)
00301         || preg_match('|^/var/www/logs/\w[\w./-]*$|', $filepath)
00302         || preg_match('|^/var/squid/logs/\w[\w./-]*$|', $filepath)
00303         // Statistics and uncompressed logs
00304         || preg_match('|^/var/tmp/comixwall/\w[\w./-]*$|', $filepath)
00306         || preg_match('|^/tmp/\w[\w./-]*$|', $filepath);
00307 }
00308 
00309 function IsNumber($num)
00310 {
00311     return preg_match('/^\d{1,20}$/', $num);
00312 }
00313 
00314 function IsName($name)
00315 {
00316     return preg_match('/^\w[\w_.-]{0,50}$/', $name);
00317 }
00318 
00319 function IsExt($ext)
00320 {
00321     return preg_match('/^\.[a-z0-9A-Z][a-z0-9A-Z_.]{0,10}$/', $ext);
00322 }
00323 
00324 function IsMime($mime)
00325 {
00326     return preg_match('|^[a-zA-Z][a-z0-9A-Z_-]{0,20}/[a-z0-9A-Z_.-]{0,20}$|', $mime);
00327 }
00328 
00329 function IsUrl($name)
00330 {
00331     return preg_match('|^[\w_.-/?=]{1,100}$|', $name);
00332 }
00333 
00334 function IsEmailAddress($addr)
00335 {
00336     return preg_match('/^root(@localhost|)$/', $addr)
00337         || preg_match('/^[a-z]+[a-z0-9]*(\.|-|_)?[a-z0-9]+@([a-z]+[a-z0-9]*(\.|-)?[a-z]+[a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9]+){1,4}\.[a-z]{2,4}$/', $addr);
00338 }
00339 
00340 function IsIPAddress($ip)
00341 {
00342     global $preIP;
00343 
00344     return preg_match("/^$preIP$/", $ip);
00345 }
00346 
00347 function IsIPRange($iprange)
00348 {
00349     global $preIP, $preIPRange;
00350 
00351     return preg_match("/^$preIP\/$preIPRange$/", $iprange);
00352 }
00353 
00354 function IsDGIPRange($iprange)
00355 {
00356     global $preIP;
00357 
00358     return preg_match("/^$preIP\/$preIP$/", $iprange)
00359         || preg_match("/^$preIP-$preIP$/", $iprange);
00360 }
00361 
00362 function IsIPPort($ipport)
00363 {
00364     global $preIP;
00365 
00366     $ipport= explode(':', $ipport, 2);
00367     $ip= $ipport[0];
00368     $port= $ipport[1];
00369 
00370     return preg_match("/^$preIP$/", $ip) && ((0 < $port) && ($port < 65536));
00371 }
00372 
00373 function IsIPList($iplist)
00374 {
00375     $ips= explode(';', $iplist, 10);
00376     foreach ($ips as $ip) {
00377         if ($ip !== '' && !IsIPAddress(trim($ip))) {
00378             return FALSE;
00379         }
00380     }
00381     return TRUE;
00382 }
00383 
00384 function IsStr($str)
00385 {
00387     return preg_match("/^[^\n]{0,200}$/", $str);
00388 }
00389 
00390 function IsSerializedArray($str)
00391 {
00392     // Serialized arrays passed to Model are small enough to warrant this unserialize() and array check
00393     // Otherwise, this is not true for return values of Model, especially logs and statistics
00394     return is_array(unserialize($str));
00395 }

00397 function IsSha1Str($str)
00398 {
00399     return preg_match('/^[a-f\d]+$/', $str);
00400 }
00401 
00402 function IsAfterHours($str)
00403 {
00404     return preg_match('/^[1-7,]*$/', $str);
00405 }
00406 
00407 function IsHost($host)
00408 {
00409     global $preIP;
00410 
00411     return preg_match("/^($preIP|::1)\s[a-zA-Z][a-z0-9A-Z_.#\s]{0,100}$/", $host);
00412 }
00413 
00414 function IsEmpty($str)
00415 {
00416     return empty($str);
00417 }
00418 
00419 function IsAsterisk($str)
00420 {
00421     return $str === '*';
00422 }

00429 function IsDateTime($datetime)
00430 {
00431     global $MonthDays;
00432     
00434     if (preg_match('/^\d{10,}$/', $datetime)) {
00435         $datetime= str_split($datetime, 2);
00437         //$Year= $datetime[0] + 0;
00438         $month= $datetime[1] + 0;
00439         $day= $datetime[2] + 0;
00440         $hour= $datetime[3] + 0;
00441         $min= $datetime[4] + 0;
00442         if (($month <= 12)
00443             && ($day <= $MonthDays[$month])
00444             && ($hour <= 23)
00445             && ($min <= 59)) {
00446             return TRUE;
00447         }
00448     }
00449     return FALSE;
00450 }
00451 
00462 function ComputeArgCounts($commands, $argv, $cmd, &$actual, &$expected, &$acceptable, &$check)
00463 {
00464     $actual= count($argv);
00465     $expected= count($commands[$cmd]['argv']);
00466 
00467     $acceptable= $expected;
00468     for ($argpos= 0; $argpos < $expected; $argpos++) {
00469         $argtype= $commands[$cmd]['argv'][$argpos];
00470         if ($argtype & NONE) {
00471             $acceptable--;
00472         }
00473     }
00474     
00476     $check= min($actual, $expected);
00477 }
00478 
00491 function ValidateArgs($commands, $command, $argv, $check)
00492 {
00493     global $ArgTypes;
00494 
00495     $helpmsg= $commands[$command]['desc'];
00496     $logmsg= $commands[$command]['desc'];
00497     
00498     $valid= FALSE;
00499     // Check each argument in order
00500     for ($argpos= 0; $argpos < $check; $argpos++) {
00501         $arg= $argv[$argpos];
00502         $argtype= $commands[$command]['argv'][$argpos];
00503 
00504         // Multiple types may match for an arg, hence the foreach loop
00505         foreach ($ArgTypes as $type => $conf) {
00506             // Acceptable types are bitwise ORed, hence the AND here
00507             if ($argtype & $type) {
00508                 $validatefunc= $conf['func'];
00509                 if ($validatefunc($arg)) {
00510                     $valid= TRUE;
00511 
00512                     if ($type & FILEPATH) {
00513                         // Further check if file really exists
00514                         exec("[ -e $arg ]", $output, $retval);
00515                         if ($retval !== 0) {
00516                             $valid= FALSE;
00517 
00518                             $errormsg= "$command: $arg";
00519                             ViewError(_('No such file').": $errormsg");
00520                             cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "No such file: $errormsg");
00521                         }
00522                     }
00523 
00524                     if ($valid) {
00525                         // One type succeded, hence do not check for other possible types for this arg
00526                         break;
00527                     }
00528                 }
00529                 else {
00530                     $valid= FALSE;
00531                     
00532                     $helpmsg.= "\n"._($conf['desc']).': '.$arg;
00533                     $logmsg.= "\n".$conf['desc'].': '.$arg;
00534                     // Will keep checking if further types are possible for this arg
00535                 }
00536             }
00537         }
00538 
00539         if (!$valid) {
00540             // One arg failed to check, do not run the func
00541             break;
00542         }
00543     }
00544     
00545     if (!$valid) {
00546         ViewError(_('Arg type check failed').": $helpmsg");
00547         cwc_syslog(LOG_NOTICE, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, "Arg type check failed: $logmsg");
00548     }
00549     return $valid;
00550 }
